title: Publisher Rocket [Amazon UK Edition] Tutorial 2020 2021 - Publisher Rocket For Beginners LCB NCB Q4

tactics.name: Keyword Research with Publisher Rocket
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify back-end keywords for niche products by analyzing Amazon UK search results and competitive metrics.
steps: Search for niche terms like 'thanksgiving word search'
Analyze competitive score, Amazon searches per month, and number of competitors
Export keywords to Excel for backend use
caveats: Requires additional course for full keyword strategy
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket makes it very easy for you...select the most relevant keywords

tactics.name: Category Search Optimization
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket's category search to identify high-potential categories for book listings
steps: Search for relevant categories using keywords like 'thanksgiving'
Identify category paths for multi-category listings
Email KDP with the category path to request inclusion
Export category data as Excel for ad targeting
caveats: Categories must be relevant to the book's content
source_quotes: you only need to get one sale to get to the top 10

heuristics.name: Low Competition Targeting
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is 1-5 and Amazon searches exceed 1000, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: mad libs thanksgiving...competitive score is one so that would be a really really good keyword

heuristics.name: Low Review Targeting
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize categories with lower competition
source_quotes: you can add eight additional categories to your book

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket now supports Amazon UK search analysis for niche keyword research
source_quotes: recently over the last couple of weeks they have brought out a new feature where you can use amazon.com uk search results

claims.statement: KDP allows up to 8 additional categories for book listings
source_quotes: you can add eight additional categories to your book

niche_patterns.example: thanksgiving word search + printable puzzle + educational
niche_patterns.description: Leverage low-competition educational activities with printable formats for Amazon UK
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines seasonal demand with high search volume for printable formats
source_quotes: thanksgiving word search...needs to be printed out

niche_patterns.description: Target specific holiday categories with limited competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines seasonal demand with niche specificity
source_quotes: you wouldn't do halloween you could do non-religious
